article.title: Quality-controlled XML workflow for publication
article.abstract: This demo shows an editorial XML converted into accessible HTML via XSLT, styled with CSS and deployable on GitHub Pages.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Preparing, structuring and validating XML before publication requires both editorial sensitivity and robust technical skills.
This example reflects a clean separation of concerns: XML for content, XSLT for presentation, and CSS for styling.
